EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate
public class EntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate

Class to compute entropy for a multi-variate values, using kernel estimates.

Author:
Joseph Lizier

setObservations

public void setObservations(double[][] observations)
Set the observations for the PDFs. Should only be called once, the last call contains the observations that are used (they are not accumulated).
